title: 2   9   0   1  / / FREELANCER
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Not Supported**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description:
trashy cyberpunk sim -- time/mood mgmt!
no ticking clock-- time acts when you do

Experience daily life in bustling 
PRODCITY#2901 in year 2901!

scavenge, work, sell drugs, freelance
and make ends meet any way you can 
to find a way to survive. 

Play a Fun Time-Management Simulation,
or just chill and explore the art in the city! This is a game you can eat a sandwich while you play, yes it's that good. we are breaking barriers
